briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Valsartan 160mg and Rosuvastatin 20mg in Patients With Hypertension and Hyperlipidemia
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Factorial, Double-blinded, Double-dummy Phase Ⅲ Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of the Coadministration of Valsartan 160mg and Rosuvastatin 20mg in Comparison to Each Component Administered Alone in Patients With Hypertension and Hyperlipidemia
summary: This study aims to evaluate the efficacy and safety of the coadministration of valsartan (Diovan®) 160mg and rosuvastatin (Crestor®) 20mg in comparison to each component administered alone in patients with hypertension and hyperlipidemia.

primaryOutcome.measure: sitDBP Changes at Week 8 From Baseline
